name: container-build-task
author: Google Cloud Tools
description: Build a Docker image with Google Cloud Container Builder.
helpMarkDown: Use [Google Cloud Container Builder](https://cloud.google.com/container-builder/docs) to build a Docker image and place it in [Google Container Registry](https://cloud.google.com/container-registry/docs).

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: GCP connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Google Cloud Platform connection to use.

inputs.name: deploymentPath
inputs.label: Image contents directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the files to package in an image.

inputs.name: buildConfigType
inputs.label: Cloud build file:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select custom to use your own [cloud build configuration file](https://cloud.google.com/container-builder/docs/config). Select Existing Dockerfile to use a Dockerfile in your image contents directory.

inputs.name: cloudBuildFile
inputs.label: Cloud Build File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The YAML or JSON file that defines the cloud build.

inputs.name: substitutions
inputs.label: Substitutions
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list of [custom substitutions](https://cloud.google.com/container-builder/docs/api/build-requests#substitutions) for your cloud build file. Takes the form `_VAR1="val1",_VAR2="val2"`

inputs.name: registry
inputs.label: Registry Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The [Google Container Registry host](https://cloud.google.com/container-registry/docs/pushing) to push to.

inputs.name: imageName
inputs.label: Repository (Image Name)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name, aka repository, of the image to build and push to [Google Container Registry](https://cloud.google.com/container-registry/docs).

inputs.name: imageTag
inputs.label: Image Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tag or version to apply to the new image.

inputs.name: imageVariable
inputs.label: Full Image Tag Output Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the build variable the task will place the full image tag (e.g. us.gcr.io/my-project/my-image-name:image-tag).
